item.title: Welcome to EPSY 630!
item.description: Welcome to EPSY 630! My name is Dr.Â Jason Bryer and I will be your instructor for this semester. I am an Assistant Professor at the School of Professional Studies at CUNY and a graduate of the Educational Psychology and Methodology program. Couple of important notes as you get started: The course syllabus located here: https://epsy630.bryer.org/course-overview I will post all course materials there. Blackboard will be used primarily for submitting assignments.
